data.comment: The match has started at Estadio do Maracana.
Natan has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 2, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 6, Flamengo pushes forward through Gabriel Barbosa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
In the minute 6, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo's Bruno Henrique is caught offside.
Santos's Jean Mota is on target but unsuccessful.
Diego Alves for Flamengo is back on the field again.
In the minute 8, Diego Alves is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Santos have a goal kick.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 11, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Santos.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Santos.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Santos throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Santos are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 15, Jean Mota of Santos smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior blows against Flamengo's Gerson for offside.
In the minute 17, Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Flamengo's Giorgian De Arrascaeta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Bruno Henrique's header is off-target for Flamengo.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Santos a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Jean Mota of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In Rio de Janeiro Santos drive forward through Madson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Santos.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Flamengo's Gerson attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Santos a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Santos are pushing forward but Lucas Braga's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Santos.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Santos at Estadio do Maracana.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Goal! Gerson heads Flamengo into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 44, The match at Estadio do Maracana has been interrupted briefly for a check on Joao Paulo, who is down injured.
Joao Paulo is back on his feet again.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Flamengo defence as Alison fires in a strike for Santos.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Natan.
In the minute 45, Marcos Leonardo is booked for the away team.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior has blown to start the second-half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 46, Felipe Jonatan is on a sub for Tailson for Santos.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Madson (Santos) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Flamengo defenders.
Flamengo have been given a penalty at Estadio do Maracana...
Goal! Gabriel Barbosa extends Flamengo's lead from the spot. They now lead 2-0.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Can Santos capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 54, Flamengo have a goal kick.
Free kick Santos.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos drives forward and Lucas Braga gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! Filipe Luis extends Flamengo's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 58, Everton Ribeiro instrumental with a fine assist.
The away team have replaced Jean Mota with Lucas Lourenco. This is the second substitution made today by Cuca.
Rogerio Ceni is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Pedro replacing Gerson.
In the minute 61, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Pedro for Flamengo drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Flamengo have been awarded a penalty in Rio de Janeiro...
In the minute 68, Bruno Marques is replacing Alison for the away team.
Cuca (Santos) is making a fourth substitution, with Guilherme Nunes replacing Marcos Leonardo.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Joao Paulo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 71, Santos's Joao Paulo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Gabriel Barbosa smashes in a penalty at Estadio do Maracana. The score is now 4-0.
Attention is being given to Flamengo’s Diego Alves and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 74, Flamengo’s Diego Alves is on his feet again at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Flamengo.
Joao Gomes (Flamengo) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, Bruno Marques (Santos) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 4-1 at Estadio do Maracana.
Madson with an assist there.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Santos.
In the minute 77, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Flamengo in Rio de Janeiro.
Goal kick for Santos at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
Flamengo's Filipe Luis has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 82, Santos's Felipe Jonatan breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Flamengo make their second substitution with Pepe replacing Giorgian De Arrascaeta.
In the minute 82, Vitinho is replacing Bruno Henrique for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Santos throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Flamengo apply pressure at Estadio do Maracana and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Pepe but the strike hits the bar!
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Santos are caught offside.
Gabriel Barbosa for Flamengo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Santos a goal kick.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Wagner Leonardo with Angelo Gabriel.
Flamengo's Gabriel Barbosa is whistled for offside at Estadio do Maracana.
Rogerio Ceni (Flamengo) is making a fourth substitution, with Pedro Rocha replacing Gabriel Barbosa.
Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Flamengo's half?
In the minute 89, Rogerio Ceni is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Michael replacing Everton Ribeiro.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Flamengo's area.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Santos have a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 4-1.
